charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to the forest
after hearing rumors that disturbing cries were
heard there.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1101_0200:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] arrived at the spot to investigate and found
Archer and Houndoom.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_0300: My, my. What’s a child doing here at this hour?
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_0301_0400:
I came to see if the rumors
were true.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_0401_0600:
If you want to know the truth behind that rumor,
people were probably hearing Houndoom’s cry.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_0402_0800: I’m the one asking the questions.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1000:
I come here regularly with Houndoom for
special training.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1100:
If Team Rocket is seen at a time or place that’s
too conspicuous, people will make a fuss.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1200:
Although it’s irritating, we have to train in a place
where people won’t easily see us.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1300:
But Houndoom doesn’t seem to care when or
where we train.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1400:
I received Houndoom from Giovanni when he was
a Houndour, so I feel strongly attached to him.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1500:
We must train ourselves to work in a way that
meets Giovanni’s expectations.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1600:
Since Houndoom became my partner, I have drilled
Team Rocket’s values into him.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1700:
One might even say that Houndoom is an
elite Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1800:
He grew up to be a worthy Pokémon that can
be of use to Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_1900:
If Houndoom and I can show our unwavering
loyalty to Team Rocket...
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_2000: I’m sure Giovanni will be pleased with us.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_0301_2100:
Don’t you want to become the leader
of Team Rocket?
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_0401_2200: You don’t understand anything, do you?
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_0302_2300: Is he forcing you to obey him?
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_0402_2400: Oh? Does it seem that way?
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_2500: I have chosen, of my own will, to serve Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_2600:
If I were to take control of Team Rocket
temporarily, it would only be in his absence.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_2700:
Nobody other than Giovanni is capable of leading
Team Rocket.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_3000:
For you, perhaps the word “bond” makes
more sense?
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_3100:
Houndoom shows me loyalty and makes a steady
effort to carry out my orders.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_3200: You would call that a “sync pair,” correct?
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_3300:
Houndoom’s mission is to support me, and my
mission is to support Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0141_00_apollo/2301_1201_3400:
Sometimes you meet those who can inspire
lifelong devotion...
